text: Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke to me. “Come,” he said, “I will show you the condemnation and punishment of the great prostitute who sits on many waters,

<st data-num="3326">with</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="4203">committed sexual immorality</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth’s</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">inhabitants</st> <st data-num="3184">got drunk</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4202" class="">immorality</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="667" class="">carried</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="667" class="">away</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there<n id="4" /> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="2847" class="">scarlet</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> that was <st data-num="1073" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="988" class="">blasphemous</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">names</st> and <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2768" class="">horns</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4016" class="">dressed</st> in <st data-num="4210" class="">purple</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2847" class="">scarlet</st> clothing,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5558" class="">adorned</st> with <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3135" class="">pearls</st>. She <st data-num="2192" class="">held</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> a <st data-num="5552" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="1073" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="946">detestable things</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="169" class="">unclean things</st> from <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1909" class="">On</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3359" class="">forehead</st> was <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> a <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, a <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st>:<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="897" class="">Babylon</st> the <st data-num="3173" class="">Great</st>, the <st data-num="3384" class="">Mother</st> of <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitutes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="946" class="">detestable things</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.”

I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> that the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> was <st data-num="3184" class="">drunk</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> of those who <st data-num="3144" class="">testified</st> to <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.<n id="1" /> I<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="3173" class="">greatly</st> <st data-num="2296" class="">astounded</st><n id="3" /> when I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, “<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="2296" class="">astounded</st>? <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="3004" class="">interpret</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2768" class="">horns</st> that <st data-num="941" class="">carries</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.

<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> you <st data-num="1492">saw</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3195">is about to</st> <st data-num="305">come up</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="12" class="">abyss</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>. <st data-num="3588" class="">The</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2730" class="">inhabitants</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>—all those <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">names</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="975" class="">book</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="575" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>—will be <st data-num="2296" class="">astounded</st> when they <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3918" class="">come</st>.

(<st data-num="5602">This</st> requires<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st> that <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>.) The <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st>. They <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="935">kings</st>:

<st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> have <st data-num="4098" class="">fallen;</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> he does <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, he <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">remain</st> for only a <st data-num="3641" class="">brief time</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> an <st data-num="3590" class="">eighth</st> king <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> one <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> is <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2768" class="">horns</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> a <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="935" class="">ruling authority</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> for <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>.

<st data-num="3778">These kings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192">have</st> a <st data-num="1520" class="">single</st> <st data-num="1106" class="">intent</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> to the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>.
They will make war with the Lamb, but the Lamb will conquer them, because he is Lord of lords and King of kings, and those accompanying the Lamb are the called, chosen, and faithful.”
Then the angel said to me, “The waters you saw (where the prostitute is seated) are peoples, multitudes, nations, and languages.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1176" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="2768" class="">horns</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st>—<st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> will <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st> the <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitute</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2049" class="">desolate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st>. They<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2068">consume</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2618" class="">burn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2618" class="">up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">minds</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4160" class="">carry out</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1106" class="">purpose</st><n id="2" /> by <st data-num="4160" class="">making</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">a</st> <st data-num="1106" class="">decision</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="932">royal power</st><n id="5" /> to the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> are <st data-num="5055" class="">fulfilled</st>.<n id="6" />
As for the woman you saw, she is the great city that has sovereignty over the kings of the earth.”
